LanguageData.sd_adv_powergen_adv_wind_turbine.label: advanced wind turbine
LanguageData.sd_adv_powergen_adv_wind_turbine.descrip: A wind-powered electrical generator. Requires a large clear space in front and behind for optimal air flow.\n\nEnergy output: 6000 Wd at max
LanguageData.sd_adv_powergen_adv_wind_turbine_Frame.d: A wind-powered electrical generator. Requires a large clear space in front and behind for optimal air flow.\n\nEnergy output: 6000 Wd at max
LanguageData.sd_adv_powergen_adv_solar_generator.desc: Produces electricity from sunlight. Does not work in the dark.\n\nEnergy output: 3400 Wd at max
LanguageData.sd_adv_powergen_adv_solar_generator_Fram: Produces electricity from sunlight. Does not work in the dark.\n\nEnergy output: 3400 Wd at max
LanguageData.sd_adv_powergen_WatermillGenerator.label: advanced watermill generator
LanguageData.sd_adv_powergen_WatermillGenerator.descr: Produces electricity from a river. Must be placed with its wheel in moving water. If watermills are placed too close together, the turbulence they generate will interfere and reduce power generation.\n\nEnergy output: 2300 Wd
LanguageData.sd_adv_powergen_WatermillGenerator_Frame: Produces electricity from a river. Must be placed with its wheel in moving water. If watermills are placed too close together, the turbulence they generate will interfere and reduce power generation.\n\nEnergy output: 2300 Wd
